T02TD1213E:314a-3: dur khrod brgyad ces bya ba dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1213E:314a-4: he ru ka dpal dpa' bo ni //
T02TD1213E:314a-5: lhan cig skyes dga' mdzes pa dang //
T02TD1213E:314a-6: bza' dang grol ba'i 'bras rab stsol ;
T02TD1213E:314a-7: / bla ma'i zhabs pad phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD1213E:314a-8: dur khrod shing dang phyogs skyong dang //
T02TD1213E:314a-9: klu ba dag chu 'dor rnams kyi ni //
T02TD1213E:314a-10: ming dang phyogs dbye gnas pa ni //
T02TD1213E:314a-11: bdag nyid dran phyir bri bar bya //
T02TD1213E:314a-12: g-yon gyi shar sogs phyogs rnams su //
T02TD1213E:314a-13: g-yas kyi dbang ldan phyogs rnams la //
T02TD1213E:314a-14: rdo rje gur gyi nang du ni //
T02TD1213E:314a-15: bzhi bzhir sbyor bar bya ba nyid //
T02TD1213E:314a-16: gtum mchog ga ha ra nyid dang //
T02TD1213E:314a-18: rnam 'jigs shar la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1213E:314a-19: phyogs su g-yon gyis yang dag gnas //
T02TD1213E:314a-20: aatta ha sa dbang ldan du //
T02TD1213E:314a-21: byin za ru ni lakshi can //
T02TD1213E:314a-22: 'jig pa'i mun pa bden bral du //
T02TD1213E:314a-23: rlung du k'i li k'i la'i sgras //
T02TD1213E:314a-24: ro langs 'byung po'i tshogs kyis dang //
T02TD1213E:314a-25: ce sbyang sgra yi 'jigs pa yis //
T02TD1213E:314a-26: rdo rje gur gyi nang du ni //
T02TD1213E:314a-27: dur khrod rnams ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1213E:314a-29: / dur khrod brgyad po rnams ni gnas //
T02TD1213E:314a-33: char sprin gyi dbang po de rnams gang zhe na /
T02TD1213E:314a-34: shi ra sha dang aa shvadtha //
T02TD1213E:314a-35: kam kelle shing tsu ta nyid //
T02TD1213E:314a-36: gong mtshungs ba ta ka ranydza //
T02TD1213E:314a-37: dbang po dang ni nor sbyin nyid //
T02TD1213E:314a-38: klu dbang de nas gshin rje bdag / dbang ldan de nas byin za bdag / srin po'i dbang po rlung bdag nyid //
T02TD1213E:314a-39: nor rgyas bu dang 'jog de nyid //
T02TD1213E:314a-40: stobs kyi rgyu dang padma nyid //
T02TD1213E:314a-41: pad chen hu lu hu lu dang //
T02TD1213E:314a-42: rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ngo //
T02TD1213E:314a-44: aa pa to dang gha na nyid //
T02TD1213E:314a-45: barsha na dang bu ra na //
T02TD1213E:314b-0: gtum @314b pa 'di rnams char sprin bdag / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ratna shr'i mi tra dang /
T02TD1213E:314b-1: dge slong sh'akya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba//
